trans-unit.source: The virtual IP address.

trans-unit.source: The virtual address state. If absent, an attempt to delete the virtual address will be made. This will only succeed if this virtual address is not in use by a virtual server. present creates the virtual address and enables it. If enabled, enable the virtual address if it exists. If disabled, create the virtual address if needed, and set state to disabled.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟地址状态。如果 absent ，将尝试删除虚拟地址。仅当虚拟服务器未使用此虚拟地址时，此操作才会成功。 present 创建虚拟地址并启用它。如果 enabled ，启用虚拟地址（如果存在）。如果 disabled ，则根据需要创建虚拟地址，并将状态设置为 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: The virtual address state. If absent, an attempt to delete the virtual address will be made. This will only succeed if this virtual address is not in use by a virtual server. present creates the virtual address and enables it. If enabled, enables the virtual address if it exists. If disabled, creates the virtual address if needed, and sets state to disabled.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟地址状态。如果 absent ，将尝试删除虚拟地址。仅当虚拟服务器未使用该虚拟地址时，此操作才会成功。 present 创建虚拟地址并启用它。如果 enabled ，则启用虚拟地址（如果存在）。如果 disabled ，则根据需要创建虚拟地址，并将状态设置为 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: The virtual address state. If absent, the system makes an attempt to delete the virtual address. If disabled, creates the virtual address if needed, and sets the state to disabled.

trans-unit.source: There are special considerations when Ansible is installed to a Python virtualenv, rather than the default of installing at a global scope. Ansible assumes, unless otherwise instructed, that the python binary will live at /usr/bin/python. This is done via the interpreter line in modules, however when instructed by setting the inventory variable ‘ansible_python_interpreter’, Ansible will use this specified path instead to find Python. This can be a cause of confusion as one may assume that modules running on ‘localhost’, or perhaps running via ‘local_action’, are using the virtualenv Python interpreter. By setting this line in the inventory, the modules will execute in the virtualenv interpreter and have available the virtualenv packages, specifically pyrax. If using virtualenv, you may wish to modify your localhost inventory definition to find this location as follows:
trans-unit.target: 将Ansible安装到Python virtualenv时需要特别注意，而不是在全局范围内进行默认安装。除非另有指示，否则Ansible假定python二进制文件将位于/ usr / bin / python中。这是通过模块中的解释器行完成的，但是当通过设置清单变量“ ansible_python_interpreter”的指示时，Ansible将使用此指定的路径来查找Python。这可能会引起混乱，因为可能会假设运行在“ localhost”上或可能通过“ local_action”运行的模块正在使用virtualenv Python解释器。通过在清单中设置此行，模块将在virtualenv解释器中执行，并具有可用的virtualenv软件包，尤其是pyrax。如果使用virtualenv，您可能希望修改本地主机清单定义以找到此位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: There are three roles that can be assigned to an entity: READERs can get the bucket, though no acl property will be returned, and list the bucket’s objects. WRITERs are READERs, and they can insert objects into the bucket and delete the bucket’s objects. OWNERs are WRITERs, and they can get the acl property of a bucket, update a bucket, and call all BucketAccessControls methods on the bucket. For more information, see Access Control, with the caveat that this API uses READER, WRITER, and OWNER instead of READ, WRITE, and FULL_CONTROL.
trans-unit.target: 可以将三个角色分配给一个实体：READER可以获取存储桶（尽管不会返回acl属性），并列出存储桶的对象。 WRITER是读取器，它们可以将对象插入存储桶并删除存储桶的对象。所有者是写者，他们可以获取存储桶的acl属性，更新存储桶并调用存储桶上的所有BucketAccessControls方法。有关更多信息，请参见访问控制，但需要注意的是，此API使用READER，WRITER和OWNER而不是READ，WRITE和FULL_CONTROL。

trans-unit.source: There is an important difference in the way that include_role (dynamic) will expose the role’s variables, as opposed to import_role (static). import_role is a pre-processor, and the defaults and vars are evaluated at playbook parsing, making the variables available to tasks and roles listed at any point in the play. include_role is a conditional task, and the defaults and vars are evaluated at execution time, making the variables available to tasks and roles listed after the include_role task.
trans-unit.target: 与 import_role （静态）相比， include_role （动态）将公开角色的变量的方式有一个重要区别。 import_role 是一个预处理器， defaults 和 vars 在剧本解析时进行评估，从而使变量可用于剧本中任何时候列出的任务和角色。 include_role 是有条件的任务，而 defaults 和 vars 在执行时进行评估，使变量可用列出的任务和角色后的 include_role 任务。

trans-unit.source: There is no facility to import a role while specifying a subset of tags to execute. If you find yourself building a role with lots of tags and you want to call subsets of the role at different times, you should consider just splitting that role into multiple roles.
trans-unit.target: 在指定要执行的标签子集时,没有导入角色的设施。如果你发现自己构建了一个有很多标签的角色,并且你想在不同的时间调用该角色的子集,你应该考虑将该角色拆分成多个角色。

trans-unit.source: There is no reliable way to achieve idempotency, so every time you specify this parameter the disk is exported, so please handle your playbook accordingly to not export the disk all the time. This option is valid only for template disks.
trans-unit.target: 目前还没有可靠的方法来实现幂等性,所以每次指定这个参数时,磁盘都会被导出,所以请对你的游戏本进行相应的处理,不要一直导出磁盘。此选项仅对模板盘有效。

trans-unit.source: There is no reliable way to achieve idempotency, so every time you specify this parameter the disks are copied, so please handle your playbook accordingly to not copy the disks all the time. This is valid only for VM and floating disks, template disks works as expected.
trans-unit.target: 没有可靠的方法来实现幂等性,所以每次指定这个参数时,磁盘都会被复制,所以请对你的游戏本进行相应的处理,不要一直复制磁盘。这只对虚拟机和浮动磁盘有效,模板磁盘的工作原理和预期一样。

trans-unit.source: There is no requirement to specify the pod or vgroup name as this is implied.
trans-unit.target: 没有要求指定pod或vgroup名称,因为这是隐含的。

trans-unit.source: These tips and tricks have helped us optimize our Ansible usage, and we offer them here as suggestions. Ultimately, though, you should use Ansible in the way that makes most sense for your organization and your goals.
trans-unit.target: 这些提示和技巧帮助我们优化了Ansible的使用,我们在这里提供它们作为建议。我们希望它们能帮助您组织内容、编写游戏手册、维护库存和执行Ansible。但最终,您应该以对您的组织和目标最合理的方式使用Ansible。

trans-unit.source: This HttpApi plugin provides methods to connect to VMware vCenter over a HTTP(S)-based APIs.
trans-unit.target: 这个HttpApi插件提供了通过基于HTTP(S)的API连接到VMware vCenter的方法。

trans-unit.source: This IP CIDR range must belong to the specified subnetwork and cannot contain IP addresses reserved by system or used by other network interfaces. This range may be a single IP address (e.g. 10.2.3.4), a netmask (e.g. /24) or a CIDR format string (e.g. 10.1.2.0/24).
trans-unit.target: 这个IP CIDR范围必须属于指定的子网,不能包含系统预留或其他网络接口使用的IP地址。这个范围可以是一个IP地址(如10.2.3.4)、一个网罩(如/24)或一个CIDR格式字符串(如10.1.2.0/24)。

trans-unit.source: This IP address must exist in a subnet with a routed interface.
trans-unit.target: 这个IP地址必须存在于有路由接口的子网中。

trans-unit.source: This actually creates 2 copies of the variable, a normal 'set_fact' host variable with high precedence and a lower 'ansible_fact' one that is available for persistance via the facts cache plugin. This creates a possibly confusing interaction with meta: clear_facts as it will remove the 'ansible_fact' but not the host variable.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这将创建该变量的2个副本，一个具有较高优先级的普通“ set_fact”宿主变量，以及一个较低的“ ansible_fact”宿主变量，可通过事实缓存插件进行持久化。这会与 meta: clear_facts 产生可能引起混淆的交互，因为它将删除“ ansible_fact”，但不会删除主机变量。

trans-unit.source: This address range must be large enough to accommodate the number of nodes that you expect to scale up to.
trans-unit.target: 这个地址范围必须足够大,以容纳您预期扩展到的节点数量。

trans-unit.source: This adds output that shows when a task is started to execute for each host
trans-unit.target: 这就增加了显示每个主机的任务开始执行时间的输出。

trans-unit.source: This adds the custom stats set via the set_stats plugin to the default output
trans-unit.target: 这将把通过set_stats插件设置的自定义统计添加到默认输出中。

trans-unit.source: This adds the custom stats set via the set_stats plugin to the play recap
trans-unit.target: 这将把通过set_stats插件设置的自定义统计添加到播放回顾中。

trans-unit.source: This affects the auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty options.
trans-unit.target: This affects the auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty options.

trans-unit.source: This affects the disk, cores, cpus, memory, onboot, swap, cpuunits options.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响disk，cores，cpus，memory，onboot，swap，cpuunits选项。

trans-unit.source: This affects vars_files, include_vars, inventory and vars plugins among others.
trans-unit.target: 这将影响到vars_files、include_vars、清单和vars插件等。

trans-unit.source: This aireos plugin provides low level abstraction apis for sending and receiving CLI commands from Cisco WLC network devices.
trans-unit.target: 该aireos插件为从Cisco WLC网络设备发送和接收CLI命令提供了低级抽象apis。

trans-unit.source: This alert config applies to auto scale alerts.
trans-unit.target: 该警报配置适用于自动缩放警报。

trans-unit.source: This alias is often used by the initiator software in order to make an iSCSI target easier to identify.
trans-unit.target: 此别名经常被启动器软件使用,以使iSCSI目标更容易识别。

trans-unit.source: This allows Ansible to connect over IP but authenticate with the remote server using it's DNS name.
trans-unit.target: 这允许Ansible通过IP连接,但使用它的DNS名与远程服务器进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This allows an Aruba controller's passwords and keys to be displayed in plain text when set to false or encrypted when set to true. If set to false, the setting will re-encrypt at the end of the module run. Backups are still encrypted even when set to false.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将Aruba控制器的密码和密钥在设置为false时以纯文本显示，或者在设置为true时以加密显示。如果设置为false，则该设置将在模块运行结束时重新加密。即使将备份设置为false，仍将对其进行加密。

trans-unit.source: This allows an explicit check with this feature off:
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以在关闭此功能的情况下进行明确的检查。

trans-unit.source: This allows for dynamic generation of VLAN lists on a Cisco IOS tagged interface. You can store an exhaustive raw list of the exact VLANs required for an interface and then compare that to the parsed IOS output that would actually be generated for the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这允许在Cisco IOS标记接口上动态生成VLAN列表。您可以存储一个接口所需的准确VLAN的详尽原始列表,然后将其与实际生成配置的解析IOS输出进行比较。

trans-unit.source: This allows matching packets that have the SYN bit set and the ACK and RST bits unset.
trans-unit.target: 这允许匹配已设置SYN位而未设置ACK和RST位的数据包。

trans-unit.source: This allows playbooks to target machines based on role, as well as to assign role specific variables using the group variable system.
trans-unit.target: 这允许游戏本根据角色锁定机器,以及使用组变量系统分配特定角色的变量。

trans-unit.source: This allows specification of the ICMP type, which can be a numeric ICMP type, type/code pair, or one of the ICMP type names shown by the command 'iptables -p icmp -h'
trans-unit.target: 这允许指定ICMP类型,可以是数字ICMP类型、类型/代码对,或者是 "iptables -p icmp -h "命令中显示的ICMP类型名称之一。

trans-unit.source: This allows specifying a DSCP mark to be added to packets. It takes either an integer or hex value.
trans-unit.target: 这允许指定要添加到数据包的DSCP标记。它需要一个整数或十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: This allows specifying a predefined DiffServ class which will be translated to the corresponding DSCP mark.
trans-unit.target: 这允许指定一个预定义的DiffServ类,它将被翻译成相应的DSCP标记。

trans-unit.source: This allows the minimum number of links to be set to 0, any hosted connections disassociated, and any virtual interfaces associated to the LAG deleted.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将最小链接数设置为0,断开任何托管连接,并删除与LAG相关联的任何虚拟接口。

trans-unit.source: This allows the playbook designer the opportunity to perform configuration commands prior to pushing any changes without affecting how the set of commands are matched against the system.
trans-unit.target: 这使得游戏本设计者有机会在推送任何更改之前执行配置命令,而不影响命令集与系统的匹配方式。

trans-unit.source: This allows the playbook designer the opportunity to perform configuration commands prior to pushing any changes, without affecting how the set of commands are matched against the system.
trans-unit.target: 这使得游戏本设计者有机会在推送任何更改之前执行配置命令,而不影响命令集与系统的匹配方式。

trans-unit.source: This allows the system to reference ports by the assigned name instead of a port number. Named ports can also contain multiple ports.
trans-unit.target: 这允许系统通过指定的名称而不是端口号来引用端口。命名的端口也可以包含多个端口。

trans-unit.source: This allows to read and write keys to vaults without having to write intermediate versions to disk.
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以在不需要将中间版本写入磁盘的情况下对金库进行读写。

trans-unit.source: This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
trans-unit.target: 这允许用户进行单次登录和重复使用会话。

trans-unit.source: This allows users to specify a directory containing vars files that are intermingled with non-vars files extension types (e.g. a directory with a README in it and vars files).
trans-unit.target: 这允许用户指定一个包含vars文件的目录,该目录与非vars文件扩展类型混杂在一起(例如,一个目录中包含README和vars文件)。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to chose a specific cowsay stencil for the banners or use ‘random’ to cycle through them.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以为横幅选择特定的Cowsay模板，或使用“随机”在它们之间循环。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to configure a larger value for the MTU, in order to enable jumbo frames (any value > 1500).
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以为MTU配置更大的值，以启用巨型帧（任何大于1500的值）。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to have multiple private hosted zones, all with the same name, attached to different VPCs.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你拥有多个私有托管区,所有的区都用同样的名字,连接到不同的VPC上。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to use existing Saltstack infrastructure to connect to targets.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你使用现有的Saltstack基础设施来连接目标。

trans-unit.source: This also creates a difference with group/host_vars when using them adjacent to playbooks. Before, the ‘first’ playbook loaded determined the variables; now the ‘current’ playbook does. We are looking to fix this soon, since ‘all playbooks’ in the path should be considered for variable loading.
trans-unit.target: 当在剧本旁边使用group / host_vars时，这也会产生差异。之前，加载的“第一本”剧本确定了变量；现在“当前”剧本开始了。我们希望尽快解决此问题，因为路径中的“所有剧本”都应考虑变量加载。

trans-unit.target: 此参数用于在 dns64 上启用/禁用dns64。

trans-unit.source: This argument is used when pushing a multiline configuration element to the ICX device. It specifies the character to use as the delimiting character. This only applies to the configuration action.
trans-unit.target: 当把多行配置元素推送到ICX设备时,会用到这个参数。它指定了用作定界符的字符。这只适用于配置操作。

trans-unit.source: This argument is used when pushing a multiline configuration element to the IOS device. It specifies the character to use as the delimiting character. This only applies to the configuration action.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数在向IOS设备推送多行配置元素时使用。它指定要使用的字符作为定界符。这只适用于配置操作。

trans-unit.source: This argument is used when pushing a multiline configuration element to the NOS device. It specifies the character to use as the delimiting character. This only applies to the configuration action.

trans-unit.target: 该参数在向Ordnance路由器推送多行配置元素时使用。它指定了作为定界符的字符。这只适用于配置动作

trans-unit.target: 该参数在将多行配置元素推送到SLX-OS设备时使用。它指定了用作定界符的字符。这只适用于配置操作。

trans-unit.source: This argument is used when pushing a multiline configuration element to the device. It specifies the character to use as the delimiting character. This only applies to the configuration action.
trans-unit.target: 当把多行配置元素推送到设备时,会用到这个参数。它指定了用作定界符的字符。这只适用于配置操作。

trans-unit.source: This argument sets the management address from LLDP.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数设置了LLDP的管理地址。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies a local path for logging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数指定了一个用于记录的本地路径。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the XML string which acts as a filter to restrict the portions of the data retrieved from the remote device when comparing the before and after state of the device following calls to edit_config. When not specified, the entire configuration or state data is returned for comparison depending on the value of source option. The get_filter value can be either XML string or XPath or JSON string or native python dictionary, if the filter is in XPath format the NETCONF server running on remote host should support xpath capability else it will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: This argument specifies the XML string which acts as a filter to restrict the portions of the data retrieved from the remote device when comparing the before and after state of the device following calls to edit_config. When not specified, the entire configuration or state data is returned for comparison depending on the value of source option. The get_filter value can be either XML string or XPath or JSON string or native python dictionary, if the filter is in XPath format the NETCONF server running on remote host should support xpath capability else it will result in an error.

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the XML string which acts as a filter to restrict the portions of the data to be are retrieved from the remote device. If this option is not specified entire configuration or state data is returned in result depending on the value of source option. The filter value can be either XML string or XPath, if the filter is in XPath format the NETCONF server running on remote host should support xpath capability else it will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定XML字符串，该XML字符串用作过滤器，以限制要从远程设备检索的数据部分。如果未指定此选项，则根据 source 选项的值返回整个配置或返回状态数据。该 filter 值可以是XML字符串或XPath，如果过滤器中的XPath格式的远程主机上运行的服务器NETCONF应该支持XPath的能力，否则会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the datastore from which configuration data should be fetched. Valid values are running, candidate and startup. If the source value is not set both configuration and state information are returned in response from running datastore.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定应从中获取配置数据的数据存储。有效值为运行，候选和启动。如果未设置 source 值，则响应于正在运行的数据存储，将返回配置和状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the optional request content (all RPC attributes). The content value can either be provided as XML formatted string or as dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定可选的请求内容（所有RPC属性）。的含量值可以为XML格式的字符串或作为字典来提供。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the port the netconf service should listen on for SSH connections. The default port as defined in RFC 6242 is 830.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数指定netconf服务应该监听SSH连接的端口。RFC 6242 中定义的默认端口是 830。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the request (name of the operation) to be executed on the remote NETCONF enabled device.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数指定要在远程NETCONF启用的设备上执行的请求(操作名称)。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the string which acts as a filter to restrict the portions of the data to be are retrieved from the remote device. If this option is not specified entire configuration or state data is returned in result depending on the value of source option. The filter value can be either XML string or XPath or JSON string or native python dictionary, if the filter is in XPath format the NETCONF server running on remote host should support xpath capability else it will result in an error. If the filter is in JSON format the xmltodict library should be installed on the control node for JSON to XML conversion.
trans-unit.target: This argument specifies the string which acts as a filter to restrict the portions of the data to be are retrieved from the remote device. If this option is not specified entire configuration or state data is returned in result depending on the value of source option. The filter value can be either XML string or XPath or JSON string or native python dictionary, if the filter is in XPath format the NETCONF server running on remote host should support xpath capability else it will result in an error. If the filter is in JSON format the xmltodict library should be installed on the control node for JSON to XML conversion.

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies the update method to use when applying the configuration changes to the remote node. If the value is set to merge the configuration updates are merged with the running- config. If the value is set to check, no changes are made to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定将配置更改应用于远程节点时要使用的更新方法。如果将值设置为合并，则配置更新将与运行配置合并。如果将该值设置为check，则不会对远程主机进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies to include passwords in the config when retrieving the running-config from the remote device. This includes passwords related to VPN endpoints. This argument is mutually exclusive with defaults.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定从远程设备检索running-config时在配置中包括密码。这包括与VPN端点相关的密码。此参数与defaults互斥。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies whether or not to collect all defaults when getting the remote device running config. When enabled, the module will get the current config by issuing the command admin display-config detail.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定在使远程设备运行config时是否收集所有默认值。启用后，该模块将通过发出命令 admin display-config detail 来获取当前配置。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies whether or not to collect all defaults when getting the remote device running config. When enabled, the module will get the current config by issuing the command show running-config all.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定在使远程设备运行config时是否收集所有默认值。启用后，该模块将通过发出命令 show running-config all 来获取当前配置。

trans-unit.source: This argument specifies whether or not to collect all defaults when getting the remote device running config. When enabled, the module will get the current config by issuing the command show running-config verbose.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指定在使远程设备运行config时是否收集所有默认值。启用后，该模块将通过发出命令 show running-config verbose 来获取当前配置。

trans-unit.source: This argument supports human readable sizes.
trans-unit.target: 这种说法支持人类可读尺寸。

trans-unit.source: This argument takes a list of set or delete configuration lines to push into the remote device. Each line must start with either set or delete. This argument is mutually exclusive with the src argument.
trans-unit.target: 此参数采用 set 或 delete 配置行的列表以推送到远程设备。每行必须以 set 或 delete 开头。此参数与src参数互斥。

trans-unit.source: This argument takes a list of regular expressions or exact line matches.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数接收一个正则表达式或精确行匹配的列表。

trans-unit.source: This argument was called 'msg' before Ansible 2.7, now it is renamed to 'fail_msg' with alias 'msg'.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数在Ansible 2.7之前叫'msg',现在改名为'fail_msg',别名为'msg'。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. The backup file is written to the i(backup) folder.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的备份。备份文件将被写入i（backup）文件夹。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current current-configuration from the remote device before any changes are made. If the backup_options value is not given, the backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 current-configuration 的完整备份。如果未指定 backup_options 值，则将备份文件写入到剧本根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的完整备份。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. If the backup_options value is not given, the backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory or role root directory, if playbook is part of an ansible role. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的完整备份。如果未指定 backup_options 值，则如果剧本是ansible角色的一部分，则将备份文件写入剧本根目录或角色根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. If the backup_options value is not given, the backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的完整备份。如果未指定 backup_options 值，则将备份文件写入到剧本根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. The backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory or role root directory, if playbook is part of an ansible role. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的完整备份。如果剧本是ansible角色的一部分，则将备份文件写入剧本根目录或角色根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. The backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前 running-config 的完整备份。备份文件将写入到剧本根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running config from the remote device before any changes are made. If the backup_options value is not given, the backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory or role root directory, if playbook is part of an ansible role. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将导致模块在进行任何更改之前从远程设备创建当前正在运行的配置的完整备份。如果未指定 backup_options 值，则如果剧本是ansible角色的一部分，则将备份文件写入剧本根目录或角色根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: This argument will check correctness of syntax; do not apply changes.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数将检查语法的正确性,不要应用修改。

trans-unit.source: This argument will configure a timeout value for the commit to be confirmed before it is automatically rolled back. If the confirm_commit argument is set to False, this argument is silently ignored. If the value of this argument is set to 0, the commit is confirmed immediately. The remote host MUST support :candidate and :confirmed-commit capability for this option to .
trans-unit.target: 此参数将配置一个超时值，用于在自动回滚之前确认的提交。如果 confirm_commit 参数设置为False，则该参数将被静默忽略。如果此参数的值设置为0，则立即确认提交。远程主机必须为此选项提供：candidate和：confirmed-commit功能。

trans-unit.source: This argument will decide how to load the configuration data particularly when the candidate configuration and loaded configuration contain conflicting statements. Following are accepted values. merge combines the data in the loaded configuration with the candidate configuration. If statements in the loaded configuration conflict with statements in the candidate configuration, the loaded statements replace the candidate ones. override discards the entire candidate configuration and replaces it with the loaded configuration. replace substitutes each hierarchy level in the loaded configuration for the corresponding level. update is similar to the override option. The new configuration completely replaces the existing configuration. The difference comes when the configuration is later committed. This option performs a 'diff' between the new candidate configuration and the existing committed configuration. It then only notifies system processes responsible for the changed portions of the configuration, and only marks the actual configuration changes as 'changed'.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将决定如何加载配置数据，尤其是在候选配置和加载的配置包含冲突语句时。以下是可接受的值。 merge 将加载的配置中的数据与候选配置合并。如果已加载配置中的语句与候选配置中的语句冲突，则已加载语句将替换候选语句。 override 将丢弃整个候选配置，并将其替换为已加载的配置。 replace 将加载的配置中的每个层次结构级别替换为相应级别。 update 与覆盖选项相似。新配置将完全替换现有配置。区别在于稍后提交配置时。此选项在新的候选配置和现有的提交配置之间执行“区别”。然后，它仅通知负责配置更改部分的系统进程，并且仅将实际配置更改标记为“更改”。

trans-unit.source: This argument will execute commit operation on remote device. It can be used to confirm a previous commit.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将在远程设备上执行提交操作。它可以用来确认之前的提交。

trans-unit.source: This argument will instruct the module when to change the password. When set to always, the password will always be updated in the device and when set to on_create the password will be updated only if the username is created.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将指示模块何时更改密码。设置为 always 时，密码将始终在设备中更新；设置为 on_create 时，密码仅在创建用户名时更新。

trans-unit.source: This argument will not modify any settings on the remote device and is strictly used to check the compliance of the current device's configuration against.
trans-unit.target: 这个参数不会修改远程设备上的任何设置,而是严格用于检查当前设备的配置是否符合要求。

trans-unit.source: This array of objects will power the action links
trans-unit.target: 这个对象数组将为动作链接提供动力

trans-unit.source: This aruba plugin provides low level abstraction apis for sending and receiving CLI commands from Aruba network devices.
trans-unit.target: 这个aruba插件为从Aruba网络设备发送和接收CLI命令提供了低级抽象的apis。

trans-unit.source: This asa plugin provides low level abstraction apis for sending and receiving CLI commands from Cisco ASA network devices.
trans-unit.target: 这个asa插件为从Cisco ASA网络设备发送和接收CLI命令提供了低级抽象的apis。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used to specify the TLVs that need to be sent and received in the LLDP packets. By default, all TLVs are advertised
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于指定LLDP数据包中需要发送和接收的TLV。默认情况下,所有的TLV都会被公布。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be used to specify the TLVs that need to be sent in the LLDP packets. By default, only system name and system description is sent
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于指定LLDP数据包中需要发送的TLV。默认情况下,只发送系统名称和系统描述。

trans-unit.source: This attribute configures custom http error messages returned to the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性配置了返回给用户的自定义http错误信息。

trans-unit.source: This attribute defines if the interface names should be advertised in the long(0) or short(1) form.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性定义了接口名应该以long(0)还是short(1)的形式发布广告。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is required when azure_access_type is either in managed mode or unmanaged mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 azure_access_type 处于托管模式或非托管模式时,需要该属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is required when azure_access_type is in unmanaged mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 azure_access_type 处于非托管模式时,需要此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used to identify and separate processing VNIs that are associated with a VRF and used for routing. The VRF and VNI specified with this command must match the configuration of the VNI under the VRF.
trans-unit.target: 该属性用于识别和分离与VRF相关联并用于路由选择的处理VNI。用此命令指定的VRF和VNI必须与VRF下的VNI的配置相匹配。

trans-unit.source: This attribute represents a key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性代表了一个关键,使客户能够拥有自己的数据进行实体关联。

trans-unit.source: This attribute represents a tag for enabling clients to add their own data.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性代表一个标签,用于让客户添加自己的数据。

trans-unit.source: This boolean converts the variable into an actual 'fact' which will also be added to the fact cache, if fact caching is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了事实缓存,这个布尔值可以将变量转换为实际的 "事实",它也会被添加到事实缓存中。

trans-unit.source: This boolean flag controls if the configuration changes should be committed or not after editing the candidate datastore. This option is supported only if remote Netconf server supports :candidate capability. If the value is set to False commit won't be issued after edit-config operation and user needs to handle commit or discard-changes explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔值标志控制在编辑候选数据存储区之后是否应提交配置更改。仅当远程Netconf服务器支持：candidate功能时，才支持此选项。如果将该值设置为False，则在edit-config操作之后将不会发出提交，并且用户需要显式处理提交或放弃更改。

trans-unit.source: This boolean flag if set validates the content of datastore given in target option. For this option to work remote Netconf server should support :validate capability.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此布尔标志，则将验证 target 选项中给定的数据存储的内容。为了使该选项起作用，远程Netconf服务器应支持：validate功能。

trans-unit.source: This boolean flag, that when set to True will send newline in the response if any of values in terminal_initial_prompt is matched.
trans-unit.target: 这个布尔型标志，当设置为True时，如果terminal_initial_prompt中的任何值匹配，都会在响应中发送换行符。

trans-unit.source: This boolean option indicates if link protection should be enabled for the LAG interface. If value is True link protection is enabled on LAG and if value is False link protection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔选项指示是否应为LAG接口启用链接保护。如果value为 True ,则在LAG上启用链路保护，如果value为 False ,则禁用链路保护。

trans-unit.source: This build step will not start until all the build steps in `wait_for` have completed successfully. If `wait_for` is empty, this build step will start when all previous build steps in the `Build.Steps` list have completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 在 "wait_for "中的所有构建步骤成功完成之前,这个构建步骤不会启动。如果`wait_for`为空,则当`Build.Steps`列表中所有先前的构建步骤成功完成后,该构建步骤才会启动。

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin allows ansible to communicate to the target machines via normal ssh command line.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin allows ansible to execute tasks on an EC2 instance via the aws ssm CLI.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin allows ansible to execute tasks on the Ansible ‘controller’ instead of on a remote host.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin provides a connection to remote devices over a HTTP(S)-based api.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin provides a connection to remote devices over the SSH NETCONF subsystem. This connection plugin is typically used by network devices for sending and receiving RPC calls over NETCONF.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin provides a connection to remote devices over the SSH and implements a CLI shell. This connection plugin is typically used by network devices for sending and receiving CLi commands to network devices.

trans-unit.source: This connection plugin provides connectivity to network devices using the NAPALM network device abstraction library. This library requires certain features to be enabled on network devices depending on the destination device operating system. The connection plugin requires napalm to be installed locally on the Ansible controller.
trans-unit.target: 此连接插件使用NAPALM网络设备抽象库提供与网络设备的连接。此库要求在网络设备上启用某些功能，具体取决于目标设备操作系统。连接插件要求将 napalm 安装在Ansible控制器上本地。

trans-unit.source: This connection will be removed in a major release after 2022-06-01. [deprecated]
trans-unit.target: 在2022-06-01之后的主要版本中，将删除此连接。[不推荐使用]

trans-unit.source: This connector deploys the playbook directly into Docker containers using the local Docker client. The following parameters are processed by this connector:

trans-unit.source: This controls how long the persistent connection will remain idle before it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了持久化连接在被破坏之前将保持多长时间的空闲状态。

trans-unit.source: This controls the amount of time to wait for response from remote device before timing out persistent connection.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了在中断持久连接前等待远程设备响应的时间。

trans-unit.source: This controls the current state of the user. present will login in a user, absent will log them out.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了用户的当前状态。 present 将登录用户， absent 将注销用户。

trans-unit.source: This controls the retry timeout for persistent connection to connect to the local domain socket.

trans-unit.source: This controls whether a failed Ansible playbook should create a .retry file.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了失败的Ansible playbook是否应该创建一个.retry文件。

trans-unit.source: This controls whether an Ansible playbook should prompt for a login password. If using SSH keys for authentication, you probably do not needed to change this setting.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了Ansible playbook是否应该提示登录密码。如果使用SSH密钥进行身份验证,你可能不需要改变这个设置。

trans-unit.source: This controls whether an Ansible playbook should prompt for a vault password.

trans-unit.source: This document describes in detail how to achieve this goal, using one of Ansible’s most complete example playbooks as a template: lamp_haproxy. This example uses a lot of Ansible features: roles, templates, and group variables, and it also comes with an orchestration playbook that can do zero-downtime rolling upgrades of the web application stack.
trans-unit.target: 本文档以Ansible最完整的示例剧本之一为模板lamp_haproxy来详细描述如何实现此目标。这个示例使用了许多Ansible功能：角色，模板和组变量，并且还带有一个编排剧本，可以对Web应用程序堆栈进行零停机滚动升级。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the proper connection and Python are used to execute your tasks locally. You can override the built-in implicit version by creating a localhost host entry in your inventory. At that point, all implicit behaviors are ignored; the localhost in inventory is treated just like any other host. Group and host vars will apply, including connection vars, which includes the ansible_python_interpreter setting. This will also affect delegate_to: localhost and local_action, the latter being an alias to the former.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以确保使用正确的连接和Python在本地执行任务。您可以通过在清单中创建 localhost 主机条目来覆盖内置的隐式版本。在这一点上，所有隐式行为都将被忽略。清单中的 localhost 主机与其他主机一样。组和主机变量将适用，包括连接变量，其中包括 ansible_python_interpreter 设置。这也会影响 local_action delegate_to: localhost 和local_action，后者是前者的别名。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes three platforms, Arista EOS, Cisco NXOS, and Juniper JunOS. Without the network agnostic modules, a sample playbook might contain the following three tasks with platform-specific commands:

trans-unit.source: This factor is used to determine the ejection threshold for success rate outlier ejection. The ejection threshold is the difference between the mean success rate, and the product of this factor and the standard deviation of the mean success rate: mean - (stdev * success_rate_stdev_factor). This factor is divided by a thousand to get a double. That is, if the desired factor is 1.9, the runtime value should be 1900. Defaults to 1900.
trans-unit.target: 该因子用于确定成功率外差弹出的弹出阈值。弹出阈值是平均成功率的差值,该因子与平均成功率标准差的乘积:平均值-(stdev*success_rate_stdev_factor)。这个因子除以千,得到一个双数。也就是说,如果需要的因子是1.9,那么运行时的值应该是1900。默认值为1900。

trans-unit.source: This field can only be specified if logging is enabled for this backend service. The value of the field must be in [0, 1]. trans-unit.target: 该字段只能在为该后端服务启用日志记录时指定。该字段的值必须是[0,1]。该字段配置了向负载均衡器发送请求的采样率,其中1.0表示报告所有记录的请求,0.0表示不报告记录的请求。

trans-unit.source: This field represents a link to a Address resource in GCP. It can be specified in two ways. trans-unit.target: 该字段表示GCP中一个地址资源的链接。它可以通过两种方式来指定。首先,你可以放置一个带有键 "地址 "和资源地址值的字典 或者,你可以在gcp_compute_address任务中添加`register:name-of-resource`,然后将这个nat_ip字段设置为"{{name-of-resource }}"

trans-unit.source: This field represents a link to a BackendService resource in GCP. It can be specified in two ways. trans-unit.source: This field represents a link to a Disk resource in GCP. It can be specified in two ways. trans-unit.source: This field should be used carefully.

trans-unit.source: This field takes multiple types of values. You can create an IP address with gcp_compute_address and place the name/output of the address here. You can also place the string value of the IP address’s GCP name or the actual IP address.
trans-unit.target: 该字段采用多种类型的值。您可以使用 gcp_compute_address 创建IP地址，并将地址的名称/输出放在此处。您还可以放置IP地址的GCP名称或实际IP地址的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: This field will be honored on a best effort basis.
trans-unit.target: 这个领域将在尽力的基础上进行表彰。

trans-unit.source: This field will only be non-null for IP connections, and only when log_hostname is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该字段只有在IP连接中才是非空的,并且只有在启用log_hostname时才会出现。

trans-unit.source: This file can also include the key as well, and if the key is included, client_key is not required.
trans-unit.target: 该文件也可以包含密钥，如果包含密钥，则不需要 client_key 。

trans-unit.source: This file must exist ahead of time.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件必须提前存在。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used similar to the default jinja2 random filter (returning a random item from a sequence of items), but can also generate a random number based on a range.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器的使用方法类似于默认的jinja2随机过滤器(从一个项目序列中返回一个随机项目),但也可以根据一个范围生成一个随机数。

trans-unit.source: This filter can be used to generate a random MAC address from a string prefix.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器可用于从字符串前缀中随机生成一个MAC地址。

trans-unit.source: This filter has migrated to the community.general collection. Follow the installation instructions to install that collection.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器已迁移到community.general集合。按照安装说明安装该集合。

trans-unit.source: This filter is built upon jmespath, and you can use the same syntax. For examples, see jmespath examples.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器基于jmespath构建，您可以使用相同的语法。有关示例，请参见jmespath示例。

trans-unit.source: This filter turns a list of dicts with 2 keys, into a dict, mapping the values of those keys into key: value pairs:
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器将具有2个键的字典列表转换为dict，将这些键的值映射为 key: value 对：

trans-unit.source: This filter will randomize an existing list, giving a different order every invocation.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器会随机排列一个现有的列表,每次调用都会给出不同的顺序。

trans-unit.source: This first demonstration uses only the tasks and vars directories. The directory structure would look as follows:
trans-unit.target: 第一个演示仅使用task和vars目录。目录结构如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This flag controls if the grid lead secondary nameserver performs zone transfers to non lead secondaries.
trans-unit.target: 该标志控制网格主次命名服务器是否向非主次命名服务器执行区域转移。

trans-unit.source: This flag controls whether the group is using an external primary nameserver. Note that modification of this field requires passing values for grid_secondaries and external_primaries.
trans-unit.target: 该标志控制该组是否正在使用外部主要名称服务器。请注意，修改此字段需要传递grid_secondaries和external_primaries的值。

trans-unit.source: This flag disables metrics and healthscore for virtualservice.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志可以关闭virtualservice的指标和healthscore。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that filesystem links in the destination, if they exist, should be followed.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志表明目标文件系统中的链接(如果存在)应该被遵循。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that filesystem links in the source tree, if they exist, should be followed.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表明,如果源树中存在文件系统链接,则应遵循这些链接。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates that filesystem links, if they exist, should be followed.
trans-unit.target: 该标志表明,如果存在文件系统链接,则应遵循这些链接。

trans-unit.source: This flag indicates whether an invalid cwd (non-existent or not a directory) should be ignored or should raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 此标志指示是否应忽略无效的 cwd （目录不存在或不存在）或引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This flag is optional, and the default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 该标志是可选的,默认值为 "false"。

trans-unit.source: This flag is set once the initial controller setup workflow is complete.
trans-unit.target: 一旦初始控制器设置工作流程完成,就会设置该标志。

trans-unit.source: This flag is used for searching existing ISOs. If set to yes, it will only list ISO ready for deployment e.g. successfully downloaded and installed. Recommended to set it to no.
trans-unit.target: 此标志用于搜索现有的ISO。如果设置为 yes ，它将仅列出已准备好进行部署的ISO，例如已成功下载和安装的ISO。建议将其设置为 no 。

trans-unit.source: This flag overrides the guest operating system detection and forcibly upgrade VMware tools or open-vm-tools.
trans-unit.target: 该标志覆盖客人操作系统检测,并强制升级VMware工具或open-vm-tools。

trans-unit.source: This flag represents whether the preferred_primaries field values of this member are used (see Infoblox WAPI docs).
trans-unit.target: 该标志表示是否使用该成员的 preferred_primaries 字段值 (参见 Infoblox WAPI docs)。

trans-unit.source: This flag sets the time duration of no live data traffic after which virtual service metrics processing is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 该标志设置了无实时数据流量的时间持续时间,之后暂停虚拟服务指标处理。

trans-unit.source: This flag stops a user from deleting or moving a group to a different path.
trans-unit.target: 该标志阻止用户删除或将组移动到不同的路径。

trans-unit.source: This flag will cause module to wait for any upgrade actions to complete.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将使模块等待任何升级动作完成。

trans-unit.source: This flag will determine whether drive firmware can be upgrade while drives are accepting I/O.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将决定驱动器固件是否可以在驱动器接受I/O时进行升级。

trans-unit.source: This flag will determine whether drive firmware upgrade should fail if any affected drives are inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将决定如果任何受影响的驱动器无法访问,驱动器固件升级是否会失败。

trans-unit.source: This flag will enable logging the command executed and response received from target device in the ansible log file. For this option to work 'log_path' ansible configuration option is required to be set to a file path with write access.
trans-unit.target: 这个标志将启用在ansible日志文件中记录从目标设备执行的命令和收到的响应。为了让这个选项发挥作用,需要将'log_path'ansible配置选项设置为一个可以写入的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: This flag will force all discovered storage systems to be added to SANtricity Web Services Proxy.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将强制将所有发现的存储系统添加到SANtricity Web Services Proxy中。

trans-unit.source: This flag will force firmware to be activated in spite of the health check.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将迫使固件在健康检查后仍被激活。

trans-unit.source: This flag will force firmware to be activated in spite of the storage system mel-event issues.
trans-unit.target: 该标志将迫使固件在存储系统熔断事件问题的情况下被激活。

trans-unit.source: This flag will only be used when creating a new API Gateway setup, not for updates.
trans-unit.target: 此标志仅在创建新的API网关设置时使用,不用于更新。

trans-unit.source: This folder structure should already exist on the remote location.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件夹结构应该已经存在于远程位置。

trans-unit.source: This follows the same rules and formatting as the -Filter parameter for the PowerShell AD cmdlets exception there is no variable substitutions.
trans-unit.target: 这遵循与PowerShell AD cmdlet例外的 -Filter 参数相同的规则和格式，没有变量替代。

trans-unit.source: This forces a test syslog message to be sent to the stated syslog server.
trans-unit.target: 这将强制发送测试的syslog消息到指定的syslog服务器。

trans-unit.source: This frr plugin provides low level abstraction apis for sending and receiving CLI commands from FRR network devices.
trans-unit.target: 这个frr插件为FRR网络设备发送和接收CLI命令提供了低级抽象的apis。

trans-unit.source: This function will be called after Popen object will be created but before communicating to the process. (Popen object will be passed to callback as a first argument)
trans-unit.target: 在创建 Popen 对象之后但在与进程进行通信之前，将调用此函数。（ Popen 对象将作为第一个参数传递给回调）

trans-unit.source: This function will not work on systems complying with FIPS-140-2.
trans-unit.target: 此功能在符合FIPS-140-2的系统中不起作用。

trans-unit.source: This functionality requires Jinja 2.7 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要Jinja 2.7或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: This gives the host time to fully initialize.
trans-unit.target: 这就给了主机充分初始化的时间。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes that you already have Ansible installed and working. Running from a Git checkout is fine. Follow the Installation Guide guide for more information.
trans-unit.target: 本指南假定您已经安装并可以使用Ansible。从Git结帐运行即可。请参阅《安装指南》以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes that you already have Ansible installed and working. Running from a Git checkout is fine. Follow the Installing Ansible guide for more information.
trans-unit.target: 本指南假定您已经安装并可以使用Ansible。从Git结帐运行即可。请参阅《安装Ansible》指南以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes you are familiar with Ansible and how it works. If you’re not, have a look at Ansible Documentation before getting started.
trans-unit.target: 本指南假定您熟悉Ansible及其工作方式。如果不是这样，请在开始之前阅读Ansible文档。

trans-unit.source: This guide covers how to work with Ansible, including using the command line, working with inventory, and writing playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 本指南涵盖了如何使用Ansible工作,包括使用命令行、使用库存和编写剧本。

trans-unit.source: This guide describes how to use Ansible with the Infoblox Network Identity Operating System (NIOS). With Ansible integration, you can use Ansible playbooks to automate Infoblox Core Network Services for IP address management (IPAM), DNS, and inventory tracking.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍了如何将 Ansible 与 Infoblox 网络身份操作系统 (NIOS)配合使用。通过 Ansible 集成,您可以使用 Ansible 剧本自动执行 Infoblox 核心网络服务的 IP 地址管理 (IPAM)、DNS 和库存跟踪。

trans-unit.source: This guide introduces basic Ansible concepts and guides you through your first Ansible commands, playbooks and inventory entries.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍了Ansible的基本概念,并指导您完成第一个Ansible命令、游戏本和清单条目。

trans-unit.source: This guide is also useful for experienced Ansible users automating network tasks for the first time. You can use Ansible commands, playbooks and modules to configure hubs, switches, routers, bridges and other network devices. But network modules are different from Linux/Unix and Windows modules, and you must understand some network-specific concepts to succeed. If you understand Ansible but have never automated a network task, start with the second section.
trans-unit.target: 本指南对于有经验的Ansible用户首次自动化网络任务也很有用。你可以使用Ansible命令、playbook和模块来配置集线器、交换机、路由器、网桥和其他网络设备。但是网络模块不同于Linux/Unix和Windows模块,你必须了解一些网络特有的概念才能成功。如果你了解Ansible,但从未自动化过网络任务,请从第二节开始。

trans-unit.source: This guide is intended for network engineers using Ansible for automation. It covers advanced topics. If you understand networks and Ansible, this guide is for you. You may read through the entire guide if you choose, or use the links below to find the specific information you need.
trans-unit.target: 本指南旨在为使用Ansible进行自动化的网络工程师提供帮助。它涵盖了高级主题。如果你了解网络和Ansible,本指南就是为你准备的。你可以选择通读整个指南,或者使用下面的链接找到你需要的特定信息。
